statements: DELETE FROM work_hours WHERE employee_id = 1 AND project_id = 3

DELETE FROM Project WHERE project_id IN (SELECT project_id FROM Progress WHERE percentage_complete < 50);
DELETE FROM projects WHERE project_manager = 'John Doe';
